channel.title: This is getting stupid
channel.description:
Certain mods here are either abusing there powers or not doing there intended job correctly. Making these forums an unpleasant place to be.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,320025.0.html - no explanation as to the locking of this thread. As far as i am concerned it should still be open
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,319899.0.html - no explanation either? From the looks of it a mod read it, got bored of it. Locked it and went on his merry way to wreak havoc on someone else.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,320208.0.html - this either proves unworthy mod positions, or at least poses no reason as to the locking
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,319481.0.html - yet another topic closed without even a words reason from the locker
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,319480.0.html - the mods posting in this thread obviously got bored and decided no one else deserved to put in there 2 cents worth
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,319346.0.html - ...sigh yet another locked thread for an unknown reason
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,318134.20.html - The moderator put in his opinion, and then promptly locked the thread. Great way to end a debate...
[b]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,320968.0.html - care to explain why? [/b] im not saying it was a great thread... but there was no reason to lock that other than out of boredom/spite
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,319659.20.html - too many bragging comments will be made? Yes...lets make wild assumptions for the pure reason of 'i cant be ass'd to read anymore answers'
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,309127.0.html - are you the kids mummy? NO. A valid thread with valid responses has no reason to be un-validly locked.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,320375.0.html - a mods job is not to control a thread. DO NOT DELETE MY POSTS (and to a lesser extent other peoples).
Now, you may be asking why did i go to the trouble to post this thread? I am a veteran scripter. Likely to be older to the cheating forums than any of you. Most of the mods are doing a good job. But a select few of you are just shitting this place up, and i demand a certain level of professionalism from the [i]'leaders'[/i] of the community.
I [b]demand [/b]that you offending mods start moderating correctly. And i [i][u][b]demand [/b][/u][/i]a personal apology from [u]Greeny[/u], to the community. You are the majority of the moderating problem. You know it, i know, the community knows it. Your shitting this place up.
edit. Just putting my main point into this first post, as im assuming Greeny will no doubt lock, and probably delete my post.
My point: Shape up Greeny, or your days as a mod are numbered.

item.title: This is getting stupid
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Squigglyo:

The problem was poor moderation.

Squigglyo:

And my wonderful solution? Moderators who do the job there supposed to do.

It’s easy to blame the mods, isn’t it?

Squigglyo:

Perhaps im the only one thats made enough noise about it.

The only one? frank_ and pwnd_ regularly whine on irc about how shit the staff/forum are, xxlegitxx left because of it, and that’s literally off of the top of my head. Many, many more mscpers do it on a regular basis.

Squigglyo:

You mods are all sticking together, so theres not going to be any surprise when one of you lock this thread.

I left this thread open hoping for an intelligent discussion about the “problems” with the staff(and to work out a solution), what I got was a returning member that doesn’t like how some staff do their job and has to bitch and whine about it until he gets his own way.

If you want to be the peoples saviour from the evil staff, be my guest. You aren’t be the first, and probably won’t be the last. The problem here is, there are people who generally don’t care about the state of the forum and just stay because it’s what their used to and like it, and people who stay who have to whine and moan about poor staff using any excuse to do so, simply because they don’t get their own way. I’m afraid you’re in the latter category, you chose to post this thread because your thread got locked, a few of your posts were deleted(for good reason, imo) and threw in a few other threads that have been locked - erm, I have to say unfairly, but with good reason. If you don’t like the forum, put up with it or leave. If you can’t do either options, at least offer valid solutions before stating the staff aren’t “doing their job”[1] and demand changes.

[1] As Greeny stated, we are doing voluntary work, we are not getting paid and do not have to do anything. The only person who gets money from these forums is the person that pays for them, moparisthebest. The rest of us staff are here because we were asked to join the staff team and agreed to do so.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

PeterMan:

Who the fuck deleted my post??

That would be me. I attempted to keep this thread from the shits, but it seems my attempt was unsuccessful.

I feel the need to lock this now; we’ve all gotten some things out and that might possibly be what was needed. Squigglyo, if you wish to continue this appeal, I suggest you do so to an administrator, as posting a thread leads to nothing more then what you see here.

And when it comes to real life, I’d hope you meet me in real life just for a moment just so you could know the reality of life and when it comes to getting the shit beaten out of you.

item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:76, topic:244635”][quote author=Squigglyo link=topic=321005.msg2540638#msg2540638 date=1226975677]
You stated you know the problems are there, yet instead of trying to make this a decent place to be, your just accepting the problems.
[/quote]
Great, it’s nice to know that people think I just sit back and do nothing.

And finaly;

What? This forum has been like this for the nearly 2 years i’ve been here - i don’t see why people are only just starting to complain? It seems like someone needs to adjust themself around the community instead of expecting the community to adjust around them.

Quoted for mother fucking truth.[/quote]

So the forum has been shittily run for 2 years?
Perhaps im the only one thats made enough noise about it.

You mods are all sticking together, so theres not going to be any surprise when one of you lock this thread.

You cant just say ‘mind your own business’ or ‘ignore it…jerk’ when a problem comes up. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 17, 2008, 08:44:10 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Thug-life, post:75, topic:244635”]I’m saying we are all perfect. None of us have ever done a bad job.[/quote]

Well i, along with people from the community disagree.

Point of fact. None of this thread was aimed towards you.

item.title: This is getting stupid
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:70, topic:244635”][quote author=Squigglyo link=topic=321005.msg2540610#msg2540610 date=1226974833]

try as you might you cant get away. They will keep dragging you in.
No one can resist flaming a retard

Just to clarify, what was the point in this thread again?

can i get a ban on Squigglyo
he fucks in here
after year of not seeing him
and demands that we are the problem and we must change for him

clearly your oblivious to the problem.
The problem was poor moderation. And you think i should be banned for pointing that out? Fuck you
[/quote]
I’m sorry but what the fuck do you propose I for one do about this?

And the ban thing was a joke, not like anybody listens to me round here, but it’s true, you’ve been back 3 or so days and you decide this place has problems. I’ve been here 2 years enough to know this place has had problems and will continue to have problems.

So go on, post your wonderful solution that it’s taken 4 pages of spam to get to.[/quote]

Point of fact, ive been back for over a month now.

And my wonderful solution? Moderators who do the job there supposed to do.

You stated you know the problems are there, yet instead of trying to make this a decent place to be, your just accepting the problems.

Tico135:

Just a warning; this thread is getting out of hand, whether or not you agree with me. If it continues, it will be locked, and warnings/mutes could potentially be given.

I accept the lock if it comes to it, ive said what i needed to say.
I do not however accept the warning/mute. Everything ive said has been valid.

Read full topic
